snippet: Liverpool need to find a leader and make Anfield a fortress again to end their long title drought, former Reds defensive anchor Glenn Hysen said....
lead_paragraph: Liverpool need to find a leader and make Anfield a fortress again to end their long title drought, former Reds defensive anchor Glenn Hysen said.

headline.main: Liverpool Need a Leader to End Title Drought-Hysen
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Need a Leader to End Title Drought-Hysen
